## getComponentTypeByClassName() function

Get component type based on class name identifier

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getComponentTypeByClassName(identifier: string): "COMPONENT" | "CONTROLLER" | "MIDDLEWARE" | "SERVICE";
```
